tool_description: A comprehensive API for stock and crypto data
title: Stock & Crypto Universe

api_list.name: Crypto Prices
api_list.description: Provides the timeseries of cryptocurrency prices. For example, to get the price of bitcoin in USD, use BTC-USD format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-crypto-universe.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/{ticker}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-crypto-universe.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
